title: The_Specialist.(1994).(L.Llosa)-Remastered-1080p.h264[)(]DTS-5.1
description:
Hi there

Here is our new remastered version of "The specialist" BD's movie with Sylvester Stallone and the beautifull Sharon Stone .

see imdb right here : <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111255/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111255/</a>

Concept is simple :
A)--> BD25 copy and Rip from this one as a sort of dubbing as reconverted video file.
B)-->The advantage is it can be playable and watchable on most computers,even older computers and low profile computers as well. 

Available spoken languages : French and English only.
Sub : English only with perfect synchronisation.

Does it Worth a download so ?
We propose...you decide anyway as far as we know.

Well...We think so ya 'cause the quality stay still acceptable for a good 15/20
(Normal quality) but do not expect more anyway.

Video codec used : mkv.h264 with very simple profile.
But sometimes simplicity does not forcibly mean bad,useless or obsolete aswell...
Full screen resolution seems possible without cropping...
We let you judge about...

Sound part has been remastered as described below :

English : downmix from DTS 5.1 HD MA/1509 kbps/48 Khz/24 bits to simpler DTS 5.1/48 Khz/16 bits/1411 kbps (max rate : 4000 kbps real)
French : upmixing from AC3 5.1/48 Khz/16 bits/640 kbps to simple DTS 5.1/48 Khz/16 bits/1411 kbps (max rate = 4000 kbps real)

See below for more details :
